title: How to Make Mayonnaise Chicken

steps.headline: Line a baking sheet or casserole dish with foil.
Prepare your dipping bowls.
steps.description: Add the mayonnaise to a small bowl and the bread crumbs in another.

steps.headline: Dip the chicken into the mayonnaise.
steps.description: Be sure to coat it only with a thin layer, as thick layers will result in a wetted-down chicken and will overpower the entire dish.

steps.headline: Thoroughly coat the chicken with the bread crumbs.
Add the chicken to the pre-lined sheet or dish.
Bake for 30 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked.
Serve with steamed white rice, mashed potatoes, or vegetables.

text: Preheat the oven to 425ºF/220ºC.  Line a baking sheet or casserole dish with foil.  Prepare your dipping bowls. Add the mayonnaise to a small bowl and the bread crumbs in another. Dip the chicken into the mayonnaise. Be sure to coat it only with a thin layer, as thick layers will result in a wetted-down chicken and will overpower the entire dish. Thoroughly coat the chicken with the bread crumbs.  Add the chicken to the pre-lined sheet or dish.  Bake for 30 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked.  Serve with steamed white rice, mashed potatoes, or vegetables.
